name: Mister Coinz
description:
[Mister Coinz]

In this game you play as Mister Coinz with the aim to collect 35 coins. Use fire balls, wall jumps and timing to achieve great success and ultimate victory!

[Credits]

Music from: https://freemusicarchive.org

sawsquarenoise - Boss Theme

sawsquarenoise - Boss Splash

sawsquarenoise - Stage  2

sawsquarenoise - Towel Defence Jingle Win

All graphics (some derived from) from Kenney  https://www.kenney.nl/assets

Sound effects also from Kenney.

Dridex icon created by myself.

Code heavily customised but based on a Godot tutorial series by BornCG https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdioEctcBLd2nw2aQkl8msw
